WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Arcane Sword
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You create a sword-shaped plane of force that hovers within range.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Delayed Blast Fireball
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Etherealness
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Finger of Death
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Forcecage
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: An immobile, invisible, cube-shaped prison composed of magical force springs into existence around an area you choose within range.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Magnificent Mansion
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You conjure an extradimensional dwelling in range that lasts for the duration.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Mirage Arcane
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You make terrain in an area up to 1 mile square look, sound, smell, and even feel like some other sort of terrain.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Plane Shift
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Prismatic Spray
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: Eight multicolored rays of light flash from your hand. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Project Image
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You create an illusory copy of yourself that lasts for the duration.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Reverse Gravity
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Sequester
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: By means of this spell, a willing creature or an object can be hidden away, safe from detection for the duration.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Simulacrum
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: You shape an illusory duplicate of one beast or humanoid that is within range for the entire casting time of the spell.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Symbol
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a harmful glyph either on a surface (such as a section of floor, a wall, or a table) or within an object that can be closed (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest) to conceal the glyph.

WizardLevel7Spells.Name: Teleport
WizardLevel7Spells.Description: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select.
